title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a black horse by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black horse. A person in a dream has many different dreams that make him feel happy or sad, according to the interpretation of the vision you saw and the clues you provide to him. Interpretation of a dream about a black horse. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black horse? Interpretation experts confirm that a black horse in a dream is a sign of strength. The high status and courage that the dreamer possesses in reality, and the interpretation of his vision varies from one person to another depending on some issues. It can be said that the interpretation of a dream about a black horse is one of the happy interpretations for a person, as it shows the distinguished position that he will reach in his work, which will make him proud of himself in front of others. It is done. Interpretation of a dream about a black horse, which the dreamer cannot control or deal with, as a high power that a person reaches but cannot manage because his capabilities are less than they actually are. If a man desires for his wife to give birth to a good son who has a high status among men and sees a black horse in In the dream, his wish will come true and he will have this son as soon as possible, God willing, because the dream is a good omen that his wife will become pregnant. A person will gain more goodness and comfort in life after seeing a black horse, whether male or female, God willing. The dream is a sign of profitable trade and fruitful work. Rather, it is evidence of success and excellence for the student, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black horse according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that seeing a black horse indicates that a person will rejoice in his life as a result of the great blessing and favor that he will receive soon. He believes that a black horse The single girl has great merit because she achieves her dreams and reaches a high position after this vision. He claims that this dream has another meaning, and one must be careful, as it is an indication of the person obtaining money through prohibited methods that anger God. It is possible that the white horse is one of the visions worthy of praise. , which is a sign of blessing and goodness, while a black horse can be a sign of times of distress and pain that befall a person in life. Ibn Sirin shows that seeing a rampaging black horse in a dream can indicate some evil for a person, as he faces many problems after seeing it and becomes confused. In life. If a woman is pregnant and sees him in her dream, this indicates that what she sees is that she will have a son with a good character and character who will be a support for her and his father in old age. Interpretation of a dream about a black horse for a single womanDream interpreters show that a black horse in a dream for an unmarried woman is a rise in Her status and blessing in her life and evidence of evil far from her and saves her from the worry and anxiety that surround her. Buying it in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions as you collect a lot of money after this vision and it is likely that you will get an important job that you aspire to and develop your skills. If she sees someone offering... If she receives a black horse in a dream as a gift, she will receive a large sum of money from this person in reality, especially if she knows him in general or from family members. Interpreters say it is a sign that she will receive a large sum of money that she can

title: Interpretation of seeing a little girl crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child crying in a dream: See the point: A little girl crying, or a small dream in a dream, indicates the occurrence of many bad events that the dreamer will go through. This is how a child cries. For a married woman, this indicates the many problems that the woman will suffer from in the coming days. This vision may be A reference to the journey of this woman’s husband for many years. A baby crying in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an incomplete pregnancy. It also indicates that this woman unfortunately had a miscarriage. As for a man, if he sees a young girl crying in his dream, this is an indication that this person will be exposed to deception and fraud and will face... Many problems in the near future. Also, seeing a child crying in a dream means that the dreamer’s son will be exposed to something bad or an accident in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a child crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If anyone sees a pajamas for a young girl who is beautiful in appearance and crying, this is good news for the person who sees kindness, optimism, and happiness in the dream. If this girl is ugly and impure, this is a sign that she will be exposed to many problems and troubles in his life in the coming period. Seeing a child crying in a dream for a single woman. If a free girl sees a child crying in a dream, this may be a sign that this girl will be late for a long time. If The dreamer was engaged, so his vision of a young girl may indicate the dissolution of that girl’s engagement. This vision also indicates this girl’s failure to achieve her goals in life or her failure in exams if she is a student. Interpretation of seeing a young girl crying in a dream with a married woman brings seeing a young girl crying from visions Happy and praiseworthy in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees a small child crying during her sleep, this is a sign that this lady will soon hear happy news. A girl crying in a married woman’s dream is likely a sign that she will become pregnant, God willing. Also, this vision It is good news for this woman who has a lot of sustenance and money on her way. Seeing a newborn baby girl crying in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the collapse of worries and problems from that woman’s life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a baby crying in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a small baby crying in a dream is a dream. Good for a pregnant woman. This vision indicates that this woman is pregnant with a boy, and God knows best. How beautiful is the child who sees a pregnant woman crying in her sleep. The longer this woman’s pregnancy lasts, God willing. Explanation of finding a lost girl crying. If one sees a child crying because he is lost in a dream, This may be a sign that the dreamer will miss many good opportunities. Seeing a little girl screaming a little lost in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is a hasty person who makes fatal decisions hastily and without delay, and this makes his life full of mistakes and negative outcomes. If one sees a little girl lost in his dream This may be a sign that the dreamer will suffer a great financial loss. Seeing a lost little girl crying for a man in a dream indicates losing his current job. As for the fiancée who sees the little girl disappearing in her sleep, this is an indication of...

title: The 9 most important interpretations of seeing Satan in a man’s dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a single woman seeing the devil in human form? It indicates the anxiety and crises that you are facing. What is the meaning of a student seeing the devil in a dream? It indicates his failure in the educational stage. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing the devil in a dream? It indicates the separation and breakup of her relationship with her husband. The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman Who is Satan in a dream? It indicates an enemy who wants to take away her joy. What is the interpretation of a man who sees himself killing Satan in a dream? It indicates that this person is strong in faith and saves people from quarreling with each other. Interpretation of seeing Satan for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl Or an unmarried woman, the devil in a dream, indicates that someone is approaching her to harm her. In addition to seeing the unmarried girl, the devil in a dream indicates the presence of a cunning person who deceives her with false feelings and she must beware of him. A single girl appears who sees the devil in some human form. She suffers from worries and crises. Seeing Satan in a dream indicates the need to repent and return to God. But if a girl sees that she is talking to Satan in a dream, this means that she will cause trouble, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing Satan for a married woman in a dreamIf you see a married woman in a dream From Satan, it is better not to interpret it, because it indicates the separation and end of her relationship with her husband, according to the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing a married woman hitting Satan in a dream means that she will get rid of her worries and problems. And seeing slaughtering Satan in a dream means getting rid of enemies, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing Satan stripping a woman of her clothes in a dream indicates separation. A pregnant woman seeing Satan in a dream indicates an enemy who wants to take away her joy. If a pregnant woman sees Satan in a dream, in the form of a man, this indicates that she Strong in faith. A dream about a man seeing Satan. As for a person who sees Satan in a dream, it shows his preoccupation with the world and his distance from worshiping our Lord and committing sins, so he must return to righteousness. And if a person sees that he killed Satan in a dream, this indicates that this person is strong in faith and saves people. Of strife among themselves. But seeing a man touched by Satan indicates that there are enemies in the dreamer’s life who want to harm and hurt him. As for the student who sees Satan in his dream, this indicates his failure in the educational stage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a man crying over Satan in a dream indicates that This man is strong in faith. One of the signs of seeing Satan in a dream is that it indicates magic, envy, and deception on the part of some people. title: What is the interpretation of a camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a camel in a dream has many connotations and meanings for dreamers and makes them desperate to know it, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic. Let us read the following. Interpretation of a camel in a dream Seeing a camel in a dream means that the dreamer has a very strong personality that makes him able to solve the crises that stand in his way easily. Great. If someone dreams of a camel and shares its meat, this is a sign that he will receive a lot of money from the inheritance that he will soon receive from his share. If the dreamer sees a camel during his sleep and gets off of it, this indicates his ability to overcome many of the difficulties he faced in his life and he will feel More comfortably after that. Seeing a camel during his sleep for the dreamer symbolizes that he will receive a very important promotion in his workplace that will help improve his status among his colleagues. Interpretation of a camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of a camel in a dream as evidence of his ability to Get rid of the people who planned something bad for him, and his circumstances will improve a lot after that. If one sees a camel in his dream, this indicates that there are many changes that will occur in his life and they will be very rewarding for him. In the event that the dreamer sees a camel during his sleep and it falls from its back This is a sign that he will suffer many losses in his work as a result of not dealing wisely with the problems he faces. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about a camel symbolizes that he is on the verge of a period filled with many wonderful achievements in many aspects of his life. What is the interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream for a woman? Single? Seeing a single woman in a dream about a camel means that her future partner will have many good qualities that will make her very happy in her life with him. If the dreamer sees a camel in her dream, this is a sign that she will be able to achieve many things that she has always dreamed of, and this It will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees a camel in his dream, this means that she will excel in the exams at the end of the school year and will get the highest grades that will make her family very proud of her. For a girl to see a camel in her dream symbolizes that she will marry a man of high standing in society and great standing. Among people. What is the interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman? For a married woman to see a camel in a dream means that she is suffering from many disturbances in her relationship with her husband and this prevents her from feeling comfortable in her life with him. If the dreamer sees a camel while she is sleeping and riding it, this means that her husband will travel To work outside the country and will be away from her for a very long time. If the dreamer dreams that she is riding a camel with her husband, this expresses her intense love for him and her willingness to do what pleases him. Seeing a woman in her dream, a camel, symbolizes the presence of those who shower her with the blessings of the life she lives and wish her to She dies from her hands. Interpretation of a camel in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant camel in a dream means that she will not face any difficulties during the birth of her child and the birth will be fine. If the dreamer sees a camel during his sleep, this is a

title: Interpretation of a ring in a dream: Seeing a ring in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a ring for a single girl, for an engaged woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, if the ring is made of gold, silver, and iron, worn on the right or left hand, and Ibn Sirin’s wedding ring is lost, and many more. A ring in a dream is a beautiful and happy dream. This is very important, especially for single people and those who did not accept marriage or engagement until they saw the dream, as the dream of wearing a ring is one of the things that the human mind thinks about a lot. Excited to get married and start a new family in life, which comes in many different and important forms that have many indications for the dreamer. Then we will review for you in our article the interpretation of seeing wearing a ring in a dream according to the great translator Ibn Shaheen, who explained it in all its important forms and meanings. Interpretation of the ring in a dreamThe Ring : A symbol of connection or separation. If the person sharing the dream removes it from his hands, this may be evidence of his betrayal of you. If a girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a ring while she is not married, or she is carrying a ring or finds it, for example, in any place, then this It means that she will have a groom, that is, she will get married, with a strong will. If a married woman dreams that she is carrying a ring or finds a ring, for example, this means that God will give her a son, that is, she will have a son. Interpretation of wearing a ring in a dream: That a young man wears a ring on his right hand Evidence of his academic excellence. Being shocked by someone with a ring is evidence that the dreamer will obtain great benefit. Selling a ring in a dream is evidence of separation from a lover. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing a ring on the right in a dream indicates her close relationship. With someone. Wearing a gold ring on the hand of a Yemeni girl in a dream is evidence of a life partner and he has no share. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing a silver ring on her right hand indicates her marriage to someone she loves. Wearing a ring studded with precious stones in a dream means that you will be associated with a person with Status and influence. For an unmarried woman who sees the ring she wears on her right hand broken, this is evidence that the engagement has been broken and will leave her engaged. The disappearance of the ring from Yemen’s hand is evidence of the problems that will arise between her and her fiancé. The girl who wears the ring on her right hand is evidence that she will get married. Soon. Seeing a girl selling the ring she wears in a dream is evidence that she will break up with her fiancé. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her husband helps her put the ring on her right hand, she will get pregnant soon. Seeing a married woman wearing a ring on her right hand in a dream It is a sign of the abundance of goodness on her way. When a married woman sees that the ring she wears on her right hand is missing or stolen, this is evidence that she will leave her husband. To dream of a married woman wearing a ring on her right hand and getting sick is evidence of recovery. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a woman Pregnant: Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a golden ring on her right hand is evidence that she will give birth

title: Interpretation of a dream about money and paper by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming about money is one of the common dreams that needs careful interpretation by famous dream interpreters. Sometimes it indicates something good and other times we find that it shows things that are not good. That is why we chose to present it to you in this article, the interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin.The scholar Ibn Sirin says if one sees old paper money in a dream.it carries a red color and appears The vision shows that the dreamer is one of God’s righteous and loyal servants. The vision shows that if the dreamer neglects his religion and performs his duties, it is a sign of adherence to his prayers and his return to God’s true path. However, if a person dreams in his sleep that he has lost his paper, the vision may indicate that he will lose one of his children. It also indicates his inability to perform religious duties such as Umrah and Hajj. While seeing a treasure chest full of banknotes, the vision may indicate a lot of money that the fortuneteller owner will obtain through his inheritance or through his work. And when a person sees in a dream a large number of banknotes The vision may indicate the arrival of a lot of good and abundant food, whether in children or money. While seeing five banknotes may indicate the five daily prayers. However, if he sees five banknotes as his hope, then he will maintain the performance of his debt, but if it is five banknotes, then it is Restricted in his religion. Other Interpretations Money in a dream is also interpreted as knowledge, faith, guidance, or that its owner will become a public employee. If someone receives money in his dream, it means that he is entrusted with something and money in the dream is also interpreted as women’s talk. Having a lot of money in a dream means conflicts, and receiving money from a known source in a dream means anxiety. If it is unknown in the dream, it means a disaster, but if one receives an engraved coin in a dream, it means that he may be harmed by his family. Or to protect him from his wife. Whoever sees a dead person giving him a coin in a dream. This means that he will escape from an unfair trial if he refuses to take money from the deceased in the dream. It means that he must beware of being unfair to others or falling victim to their injustice. If he finds someone who has ten If he has five coins and then sees double them in a dream, this means that he will double his money. Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Losing money in a dream when a person dreams that he has lost a lot of money. Money, the vision indicates that he will be exposed to many problems, worries, and family disputes. While seeing money burning indicates theft or a major loss. But if one sees in a dream that he is after money, but finds it missing, the vision may indicate that he paid a lot of money, But he will be sad after paying him.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about death for the living?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about death for the living Interpretation of a dream about death for the living is one of the dreams that repeat themselves a lot and make the person confused about its interpretation, so many dream interpreters have interpreted this dream with different interpretations depending on the person who sees it. Interpretation of a dream about death for the living Many scholars have interpreted this dream and different websites will explain all its interpretations as follows: Seeing a dream about the death of a living person in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has a long life. Interpretation of a dream about death in a living person indicates that the dreamer will suffer from many problems in his life and will need help. This dream may indicate that the dreamer will leave his beloved. Interpretation of a dream about death for the living by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the death of a living person in a dream can be evidence that the dreamer is hiding a certain secret from the people around him. Interpretation of a dream about death in a living person is evidence that the owner of the dream is distancing himself from some of those close to him due to differences between them. It is possible that death in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is currently facing some psychological problems that affect him negatively, which prompts him to see this dream. If a person sees in his dream that there is a living person in reality who died in a dream, this dream is evidence that this person will travel for many years and move away About the dreamer. A married woman's dream of her husband's death is evidence of the death of love between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream of death by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing death in a dream can be a result of the dreamer leaving something he had been doing for a long time and then stopping it. Ibn Sirin believes that the death of a person known to the viewer in a dream is evidence of the final end of the relationship between the visionary and this person in the dream. The interpretation of a dream of the death of a living person in a dream can sometimes be an indication of the dreamer's liberation from a certain stage in his life and the beginning of a new stage. Death in a divorced woman's dream can be a sign that this woman will be freed from the sorrows and problems that controlled her in the past. Seeing a pregnant woman die in her dream is a sign that her due date is approaching and relieves the pains of pregnancy that she feels. The meaning of a dream of death for a single woman Ibn Sirin believes that seeing an unmarried girl engaged to death in her dream can be a sign of the dissolution of that girl's engagement. Death in an unmarried girl's dream may be a sign that this girl will leave her studies and graduate this year. Seeing a single girl working in a certain job die in her dream may be a sign that this girl will leave her job and find a job Another. The death of an unmarried girl in a dream may be evidence that the girl does not feel love towards her partner. The symbol of death in a dream. Death in a dream may be evidence that the dreamer is getting rid of some habits that he used to do before in his daily life. Death in a dream can be a sign that the dreamer has gone through a difficult stage in his life. Death in a dream can be evidence of separation between a man and his partner, either for many years or divorce. Interpretation of seeing death for the living by Al-Nabulsi When the dead comes to the

title: Interpretation of more than one moon in a dream - seeing moons in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of many moons in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether he sees two moons, three moons in the sky, or a dream of the moon near the Earth by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing more than one moon in a dream has different connotations and interpretations depending on the details of the vision. According to scholarly interpreters, the interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. Interpretation of more than one moon in a dream. Seeing three moons in the sky indicates that you will have friends who supervise the city, and seeing the moon indicates parents and siblings. We will explain the interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. We will also explain the interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream according to the condition of the dreamer. Interpretation of the moon In a dream, if the dreamer sees that he is looking at the moon in his dream and does not find it, this indicates that the dreamer will lose his money or wealth if the dreamer is rich in reality. But if the dreamer is poor, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of livelihood and money, and if the moon is seen in a room The house in a dream, this indicates that marriage is near for the dreamer. And if the dreamer sees that he is bowing to the moon in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer is committing a sin or disobedience, and if he sees the sun and the moon bowing to the dreamer in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer honors their parents, because it indicates The satisfaction of the father of the visionary. Interpretation of the moon in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing the moon in a dream as evidence that the person with the vision will give birth to a child, and the child is likely to be a boy. Interpretation of the moon in one dreamIf an unmarried girl sees the moon in her dream, and the moon is full and large, This means that happiness and hope will enter the life of the person who sees it. If an unmarried girl sees the moon in her dream and the moon is small and incomplete, this indicates sadness in the dreamer’s life. If an unmarried girl sees the crescent moon in a dream, this indicates the arrival of good and abundant livelihood. For those who have seen it, and God knows best. Interpretation of the moon in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees the moon in her dream and the moon is bright and bright, this indicates the good financial condition of the husband of the woman who had the vision. If a married woman sees the moon in her dream and the moon is dark, this indicates that her husband He suffers from a faltering financial situation. If a married woman sees the moon absent, this indicates that there is no affection and love between her and her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of the moon in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing the moon in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that her child will be a boy, and if a married woman sees the full moon in Her dream, this means that her child will be of great importance in her life in the future. Interpretation of the moon in a man’s dream: A single man’s vision of the moon in a dream is evidence of the soonest date for his marriage or engagement, God willing. If the dreamer gets married = and his wife is pregnant and he sees the moon in a dream, this indicates that His wife will give birth to a boy, God willing, and God knows best. If a person sees the moon in his dream and the moon shines, this indicates that the dreamer will gain a great position in society. Interpretation of the vision of the moon

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about traveling for married people?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a married woman: Seeing a trip is considered one of the visions that have many meanings according to jurists. Not all trips are worthy of praise, and not all of them are reprehensible, and this depends on personal circumstances, living conditions, the status of the visionary, and the details you see that affect. The context of the dream: In this article, we have collected all the indicators and cases related to the vision of a married woman traveling. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a married woman: The vision of a journey expresses successive transformations in life, trips from one place to another, and the changes that occur in her life and force her to a new lifestyle. If he sees that he is traveling to A specific place, and he knows that, then this is evidence of longing and yearning for that place, or preparing for a journey of awakening and preparing for this matter for a long time. And if you see that he is traveling to a place and knows that the place he traveled to is better than the place in which he lives, then this indicates a change in circumstances to The best, and relief from worries, sorrows, and heavy burdens. But if the place she is in is better than the place she is traveling to, then this is an indication of the instability of conditions for the worse, and if she finds difficulty in knowing what is best for her, then this symbolizes dispersion, helplessness, alienation, and separation from loved ones. Goodbye. For the family. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman traveling by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that travel is moving from one house to another, a journey from one place to another, and a journey that a person prepares for. And if she sees that she is traveling, this indicates the desires that torment her. But if she sees a sick person traveling to an unknown place, this indicates It indicates the nearness of his death or that the illness is serious. This vision also expresses revealing the intentions of others, knowing the morals of others, ensuring the truthfulness of words and actions, and seeking legitimate livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s journey indicates the stages she goes through from pregnancy to labor and birth, And the problems and difficulties that she faces as she goes through these stages and the fears that she faces regarding childbirth. And if she sees that she is traveling to a familiar place, this indicates the approaching date of her birth, and that she has softened, reached safety, emerged from adversity, and moves to a home where she finds peace and comfort. And reassurance, and that she will receive her baby soon. But if the trip was to an unknown place, and she actually intended to travel, this indicates that she traveled awake and prepared for this matter after the birth of her child. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman traveling by plane: Traveling by plane indicates dreams, great hopes, and long-awaited desires. And expectations that go beyond her imagination, and future plans that aim to secure her future positions. And if she sees that she is traveling by plane, this indicates that there are sudden changes in her life, flexibility and acumen in dealing with the requirements of the current stage, and her ability to get out of life’s battles with the least losses. And if she sees that she is traveling By plane with her husband, this indicates a state of tension in her relationship with him, and the causes of this tension, imbalance and recovery, and the situation has changed dramatically. Interpretation of a dream about traveling by car for a married woman

If she sees that she is traveling by plane with her husband, this indicates a state of tension in her relationship with him, and the reasons for this tension and imbalance and healing, and a significant change in the situation. title: Interpretation of seeing a thief escaping in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a thief escaping in a dream for a man: A thief watching a man in a dream indicates that someone is watching someone close to him, as well as evidence that there is someone in your life who sees him as jealous, hates him, and hates him. Seeing a thief in a dream means improving the dreamer’s health after illness and fatigue and enjoying health and well-being. As for If the thief is wearing black clothes, the color is a sign of worry and worry, as well as fatigue and illness. Like a thief in a dream, it indicates good health and improved health after fatigue. See the thief stealing the Book of God, and this indicates hatred and distance from the Creator, and God knows best. Following the unknown thief indicates participation in the field of work and profit in the field of work. Trade with each other, or indicates lineage and connection. When a thief steals my house and my money, this is evidence of being exposed to trouble and stumbling upon the financial condition of the fortuneteller. But if the thief entered the house and did not steal anything, this is evidence of changing the place or traveling for the sake of profit and legitimate gain. Interpretation of a thief seeing an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If you see a single girl stealing in your dream, this means that you are in a relationship with a good person. Seeing a thief stealing your personal belongings is evidence of a relationship with a person whose characteristics are lies, deceit, deceit, and hypocrisy. But if the theft of gold is Jewelry by the thief indicates the existence of a close relationship with a well-known person of high status and who has a high and great relationship. Interpretation of the dream of the thief escaping by Ibn Shaheen: While the thief steals something special from the girl, this is evidence of people reminding her of obscene words. When seeing the thief being arrested, this indicates Having a relationship with a man whose financial condition is good and makes her happy. A thief steals papers from your bag. Seeing a thief stealing papers from your own bag is evidence of lost opportunities that cannot be replaced, as well as misusing them and feeling remorse for losing them. Seeing a thief stealing money from your pocket indicates sins and gossip. Gossip, as well as hearing unpleasant news about the girl. If the thief is stealing food, this indicates that you will hear warm news within a few days. Also, running after the thief is evidence of a strong will and ability to achieve the goal, as well as insistence on achieving it. Interpretation of the vision of the escaping thief. In Nabulsi, I see a thief entering the house, and this is evidence of connection with good youth and morals. Seeing an unmarried woman being robbed by a thief means that someone is approaching her in different ways. Where do you see a single woman? As for the thief, this is evidence of her poor psychological state from her parents and her family’s pressure on her. Interpretation of seeing a thief In a dream for a married woman, seeing a thief in the house is evidence of multiple problems with her partner, and God knows best. Then seeing the thief being chased is evidence of determination and overcoming crises and difficulties, followed by living happily, contentedly and stably. Where do you see the thief stealing things from the house? This is evidence of the presence of another wife for the husband. Seeing many Thieves in the house are a sign of the presence of deceitful friends who want bad things for her. Seeing a thief and a married woman who knows him is evidence that he will be exposed to difficult and difficult circumstances.
